name: lantern (lanterndata)
description: [项目级] PostgreSQL vector database extension for building AI applications。来源: https://github.com/lanterndata/lantern

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
PostgreSQL vector database extension for building AI applications

来源: https://github.com/lanterndata/lantern
语言: Rust
Stars: 875

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
CHANGELOG.md
CONTRIBUTING.md
Cargo.toml
LICENSE
README.md
ci
ci/scripts
docker
docker/Dockerfile
docker/Dockerfile.cli
docker/Dockerfile.cli.cuda
docker/Dockerfile.dev
docker/Dockerfile.pg
lantern_cli
lantern_cli/Cargo.toml
lantern_cli/README.md
lantern_cli/src
lantern_cli/tests
lantern_extras
lantern_extras/Cargo.toml

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- Embedding generation for popular use cases (CLIP model, Hugging Face models, custom model)
- Interoperability with pgvector's data type, so anyone using pgvector can switch to Lantern
- Parallel index creation via an external indexer
- Ability to generate the index graph outside of the database server
- Support for creating the index outside of the database and inside another instance allows you to create an index without interrupting database workflows.
- See all of our helper functions to better enable your workflows
